job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: pDo you want to design software for electric vehiclesnbspIf so and you enjoy working with a great small team of engineers we may have the job for youppnbspppWe are looking for a Embedded Software Engineer to code and debug realtime embedded firmware for electric motor controllersinvertersnbsppp strongnbspstrongppstrongWhat youll dostrongppstrongnbspstrongpulliWrite effective and efficient realtime softwareliliFollow software development cycles including software requirements capture and verification of software to these requirementsliliDesign setup and run tests to ensure the design meets specificationsliliDebug systemsliliProvide support to continuation engineering and other Curtis engineering teamsliliParticipate in the preparation of development specificationsliliWork within a small design team to complete assigned objectivesliliCollaborate with Curtis engineering sites around the worldliulpbrppnbspstrongWe are interested in hearing from you if you possess the followingstrongpulliBachelors degree plus 35 years of experience in embedded realtime softwareliliSkilled in realtime software programming using high level languagesliliUser of emulators incircuit testing and software debugging toolstechniquesliulpnbspppstrongNice to havestrongpulliExperience with serial communication protocols using CAN for example CANopen J1939 UDS etcliliKnowledge of control and feedback systems for power and motor controlliliKnowledge of realtime operating systems and task schedulersliliKnowledge of electronic circuits and implementationliliExperience with Modelbased design MBDliliExcellent interpersonal skillsliliEffective verbal and written communication skillsliulpp
